about.title: About Vadatei
about.tagline: Experience you can trust, results you can measure.
about.heading: Your Strategic Technology Partner
about.p1: With over 30 years in IT leadership and transformation, Marek Tolasz has helped organizations streamline operations, cut costs, and unlock growth.
about.p2: Vadatei was created to bring that expertise to businesses that want IT to be a strategic advantage, not just a support function. We identify the real challenges, design practical solutions, and help you implement them for lasting measurable results.

experience.title: 30+ Years Experience
experience.description: Decades of proven results leading IT teams and transformation projects across multiple industries

impact.title: Measurable Business Impact
impact.description: Solutions designed to cut costs, improve efficiency and drive sustainable growth

diagnosis.title: Fast Insightful Diagnosis
diagnosis.description: We pinpoint the real issues quickly, so every improvement is targeted and effective

hero.headline: Leading IT Consulting
hero.subhead: With over 30 years of industry expertise, we provide strategic technology guidance that transforms businesses. Partner with us to navigate complex IT challenges and unlock your organization's full potential.

footer.description: We help organisations modernize their IT, improve performance and reduce costs.

newsletter.title: Newsletter
newsletter.desc: Get occasional updates and insights about IT strategy and transformation.

process.heading: Our Proven Process
process.subhead: A systematic approach that ensures every engagement delivers maximum value and lasting results.

audit.title: Audit & Discovery
audit.description: We conduct in‑depth interviews and assessments to identify your priorities, challenges, and opportunities. This establishes a clear baseline for the rest of our collaboration.

strategy.title: Building a Strategy
strategy.description: We immerse ourselves in your business to uncover actionable steps that drive your goals forward. This stage gathers insights that guide every decision moving forward.

roadmap.title: Roadmap
roadmap.description: We create a comprehensive, actionable roadmap tailored to your business with implementable changes, projects, and workshops that help you succeed.

deployment.title: Deployment
deployment.description: We empower your team to own execution, providing tools, coaching and ongoing support so improvements are implemented effectively and sustainably.

guidance.title: Guidance & Collaboration
guidance.description: Ongoing support, coaching, and mentoring throughout every phase, ensuring your team is empowered, aligned, and kept in the loop.

services.sectionIntro: Comprehensive IT consulting and delivery services to modernize your technology, improve performance and reduce costs.

cta.title: Ready to transform your IT?
cta.body: Let's discuss how our expertise can help you deliver measurable value from your technology investments.

it-health-check.title: IT Health & Performance
it-health-check.description: Audit and optimisation to increase stability, performance and cost-efficiency.
it-health-check.fullDescription: Our IT Health & Performance engagement combines deep‑dive audits with prioritized remediation. We identify security and resilience gaps, diagnose performance bottlenecks and deliver a pragmatic plan to reduce cost while improving uptime and user experience.

digital-transformation.title: Digital Transformation
digital-transformation.description: Strategic roadmapping and delivery support for technology modernization and process change.
digital-transformation.fullDescription: We create a pragmatic transformation roadmap aligned to business outcomes. From prioritisation and solution selection to delivery planning and adoption, we help organisations modernise in phases that deliver measurable value and minimise disruption.

cio-as-a-service.title: CIO as a Service
cio-as-a-service.description: Experienced part-time CIO leadership and hands‑on coaching to align strategy, governance and delivery.
cio-as-a-service.fullDescription: Access senior CIO capability without a full‑time hire. We provide strategic direction, governance, vendor management and practical coaching to upskill teams and ensure initiatives are executed effectively.

items.question: What does an IT consultant do?
items.answer: An IT consultant assesses your technology, recommends improvements, designs solutions and helps implement strategic projects to meet business goals.

items.question: Why should my business hire an IT consultant?
items.answer: A consultant brings experience and objectivity to solve technical problems faster, reduce risk, optimise costs and align IT with your business strategy.

items.question: Do you offer cloud migration services?
items.answer: Yes — we plan migrations, select cloud providers, design the target architecture, migrate workloads and validate performance and security post-migration.

items.question: Can you help integrate new software into my current systems?
items.answer: Yes — we design integration patterns, build connectors, plan data migrations and validate end-to-end workflows to ensure smooth adoption.

items.question: Where are your services available?
items.answer: We are based in Ostrava and serve clients across the Czech Republic and the EU; onsite visits are available when needed.

items.question: Do you offer remote IT consulting?
items.answer: Yes — most work can be done remotely; we combine remote collaboration with onsite visits for workshops or deployments.

items.question: How quickly can we start working together?
items.answer: Typical timeline: initial discovery within days, proposal within 1–2 weeks and project start once scope and terms are agreed.

items.question: What is your consulting process like?
items.answer: We start with discovery, define goals, design solutions, implement in phases and validate results with KPIs and knowledge transfer to your team.

items.question: Do you provide one-time consultations or ongoing support?
items.answer: Both — we offer one-off advisory sessions, project engagements and retainer-based ongoing support depending on your needs.

items.question: Do you offer a free consultation?
items.answer: Yes — we offer a short introductory consultation to understand your needs and propose next steps at no charge.

items.question: Can you help with cybersecurity audits?
items.answer: Yes — we perform security assessments, vulnerability reviews, policy audits and recommend remediation and best practices to reduce cyber risk.

items.question: Do you sign NDAs with clients?
items.answer: Yes — we sign NDAs to protect confidential information before detailed discussions or access to sensitive data.

items.question: How do you ensure my company’s data stays secure?
items.answer: We follow security best practices, use encrypted channels, apply least-privilege principles and help implement policies and controls to protect data.

items.question: How will IT consulting improve my business?
items.answer: Consulting improves efficiency, reduces downtime, enables better decision-making and aligns technology investments with business objectives.

items.question: Can you help reduce IT costs?
items.answer: Yes — through optimisation, consolidation, automation and selecting cost-effective cloud and licensing strategies we reduce total cost of ownership.

items.question: What ROI can I expect from working with you?
items.answer: ROI varies by project; we focus on measurable outcomes (cost savings, productivity gains, revenue enablement) and define success metrics during discovery.

title: Vadatei - Expert IT Consulting for Business Growth
description: Boost productivity and cut costs with tailored IT consulting. Over 30 years of experience helping businesses scale smarter.
